name: Nancy Drew®: Treasure in the Royal Tower
description: Follow Ancient Clues to Find Marie Antoinette’s Legendary Secret!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 166 MHz or greater Pentium or equivalent class CPU Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: 16-Bit DirectX 7.0 compatible graphics video card Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: 16-Bit DirectX 7.0 compatible sound card
